name: MONSTER BUDDIES
description:
MONSTER BUDDIES!

Have you ever wanted to test your social skills out on some monsters? Well, now you finally can! Journey through the endless maze of monsters and socializing. Try to make as many friends as possible without over extending.

How To Play

You only need your mouse to go on this journey! Point and click to traverse the corridors and befriend groups of monsters. The difficulty will get harder the deeper you journey, and you may encounter up to three monsters at once!

Making Friends

Making friends is so easy. Just spread some of that warm love you're full of! Choose from three random moves a turn. Try to be strategic, not every move will be well received by each monster and some moves might even help you recharge! Try out different moves on different monsters to see what makes friends the fastest.

Avoiding The Coldness

These monsters aren't very social creatures. When first meeting them, they might be kind of cold. Avoid their icy glares as well as anything else they may throw at you. Watch your warmth in the top left, if it goes below zero, you'll be too drained to continue your journey.
